name: a diecey situation
description:
A diecey situation is a bullet-hell game where you fight a giant dice by colliding with it, made for the 2022 GMTK game jam.

The game was made by Vitor and Itayt (Listen to his music at https://www.youtube.com/c/itayt), with help of Squiggle and

Kxffie (compiled the windows build. Go subscribe to his channel at: https://www.youtube.com/c/Kxffie)

---- CONTROLS ----

Arrow keys or left joystick to move.

ESC to quit.

---- DISCLAIMER ----

WARNING: This game was made to be played in a 16:9 screen.

POWERED BY THE URSINA ENGINE
